message.content: {"given_definition_quality":90,"better_definition":"the next time; on another occasion","sentence":"下次见。","image_prompt":"A young person waving goodbye as they walk down a deserted street, with soft, glowing sunlight and gentle plant overgrowth. The scene feels slightly apocalyptic but calm and hopeful, with the sense that they will meet someone again in the future. Soft apocalypse animation style, warm and muted tones, gentle ambiance.","sentence_translation":"See you next time."}
